title: bolt.diy: The Future of Open Source AI Coding - What's Next?
description:
Join the bolt.diy community over in the oTTomator Think Tank!

https://thinktank.ottomator.ai/

Last week I announced a partnership between my platform, oTTomator, and StackBlitz to make bolt.diy (previously oTToDev) the OFFICIAL open source bolt.new! With this announcement, the project and our community completely blew up and I could not be more pumped! But just as important as making this partnership with StackBlitz is keeping up the momentum for bolt.diy so we can keep building the BEST open source AI coding assistant.

And we are certainly moving fast. So in this video, I share a bunch of updates, resources, and a revamped roadmap to help keep you in the loop with all the incredible things going on! Our biggest task right now behind the scenes besides pumping out more awesome features is working on the quality of the repository (organizing PRs, setting up releases, improving the project stability, etc.) to truly take the maturity of our open source project to the next level!

Some of the maintainers have also been working SUPER hard building up resources to help you run bolt.diy yourself, host it in the cloud, and troubleshoot common issues, so I showcase that as well!

Quick correction! The debug tab feature was implemented by Stijnus: https://github.com/Stijnus
Seriously nice work there! Sorry for the wrong attribution in the video!
